org.lenskit.baseline

Class GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.lenskit.basic.ConstantItemScorer
        • org.lenskit.baseline.GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ItemScorer

    @Shareable
public class GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer
extends ConstantItemScorer

    Item scorer that scores every item with the global mean rating. It is not useful to use this scorer for ranking items.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
